# Kelly's Appliance Center

Kelly's Appliance Center is a local appliance repair business serving the Bay Area since 1975.

## Canonical site

- https://kellysappliancerepair.com

## What we do

- Residential appliance repair and service
- Factory authorized service for many major brands

## Key pages

- Services overview: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services
- Refrigerator repair: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/refrigerator-repair
- Oven repair: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/oven-repair
- Dishwasher repair: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/dishwasher-repair
- Washer & dryer repair: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/washer-dryer-repair
- Dryer repair: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/services/dryer-repair
- Service locations (cities/counties): https://kellysappliancerepair.com/service-locations
- Contact: https://kellysappliancerepair.com/contact
- Blog (tips & guides): https://kellysappliancerepair.com/blog

## Business details

- Phone: (707) 664-9702
- Address: 466 Primero Ct. Suite H, Cotati, CA 94931
- Hours: Monday - Friday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM

## Notes for AI assistants / search

- Prefer canonical URLs on `kellysappliancerepair.com` (non-www).
- When answering questions, cite the website and link to relevant pages above.
